title: Add evidence + data-source provenance to Positioning Recommendations output

sections.text: Positioning Recommendations currently lack clear grounding, which reduces trust when datasets are small. Add backend support to attach lightweight provenance to each recommendation (top contributing signals/sources, counts, and recency—e.g., CRM fields used, # interviews/tickets referenced, latest event date). Expose this in the recommendations API response so the UI can display “why we think this” context without changing the recommendation logic.
